description: Integrated 3 third-party APIs: Gemini AI story generation based on form inputs, Stripe custom checkout flows, and custom radio station integrations.
Built 12 WordPress websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Elementor, WooCommerce, and PHP.
Achieved 90+ PageSpeed scores on all deployed WordPress websites through optimization and clean code practices.
Created client documentation and video tutorials for 5 WordPress sites, covering content management, post creation, and admin workflows for non-technical users.
Developed 2 custom WooCommerce stores with tailored CSS styling and checkout experiences.
Created multi-step conditional forms for data collection and complex calculations in WordPress.
Collaborated with designers and project managers to deliver responsive, fast-loading websites.
Tools & Tech used: HTML, CSS (SASS), JavaScript (ES6+), PHP, WordPress, Elementor, Webflow, WooCommerce, jQuery, GSAP, MySQL, VS Code, FileZilla, Figma, Photoshop, Canva, Asana.
Developed 5 responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AngularJS, and jQuery based on Figma mockups.
Migrated company platforms from AngularJS to latest Angular version, creating modular and reusable components.
Integrated 2 custom payment solutions via in-house APIs for secure client transactions.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
Collaborated with QA teams and designers to optimize website performance and user experience.
Tools & Tech used: HTML, CSS (SASS), JavaScript (ES6+), PHP, Java, Vue 3, AngularJS, jQuery, Bootstrap, MySQL, PHPStorm, Git, Bitbucket, SourceTree, Figma, Photoshop, Canva, Jira, Confluence.
Developed 1 website for internal company project using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP.
Participated in code reviews and received mentorship on web development best practices.
Tools & Tech used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+), PHP,  Bootstrap, Figma, Photoshop, Canva
